title: PBE LCU - We have restored this installation to a previous version of League of Legends.
body:
When i start up the PBE League Client Update, this message keeps showing up and the client won't update at all. I tried repairing the client but nothing happens.

https://i.imgur.com/2AvvvBW.jpg

replies.body:
Have you checked if you have enough disk space for the update? Try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (r-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your PBE installation directory (wherever you installed it). 

Let me know if this resolved the issue!
the update works on the Legacy client but on the LCU

Ah, thanks for that additional context. Since the Legacy client and the LCU use different frameworks and browser settings, this could be caused by a bad network configuration or Firewall issue. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should ensure your network settings are in the green.

Hit me back if you continue to see issues.
